Text: Botany, also called plant science(s), plant biology or phytology, is the science of plant life and a branch of biology.
Triplets:<Botany
2:
--------------------
Text: Botany:  The term "botany" comes from the Ancient Greek word βοτάνη ("botanē") meaning "pasture", "grass", or "fodder"; βοτάνη is in turn derived from βόσκειν ("boskein"), "to feed" or "to graze".
